00023 #ifndef _CTK_MUTEX_HPP
00024 #define _CTK_MUTEX_HPP
00025 
00026 #ifndef __SPU__
00027 # include "ctk_mutex.h"
00028 # include "Exception.hpp"
00029 #else /* __SPU__ */
00030 # if defined(UNIT_TEST) || defined(_CTKLIB)
00031 #  include "ctk_spu_mutex.h"
00032 # else
00033 #  include "spu/ctk_spu_mutex.h"
00034 # endif
00035 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00036 
00041 namespace ctk {
00042 
00046 class Mutex : public EAObject {
00047         ctk_mutex_ea_t m_lock;
00048 
00049     public:
00050 #ifndef __SPU__
00051 
00052         Mutex() : m_lock(0) {
00053             int ret = _ctk_mutex_create(&m_lock);
00054             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00055                 throw Error(ret);
00056             alloc();
00057         }
00058 
00060         Mutex(const Mutex &mutex) : m_lock(mutex.m_lock) {
00061             copy(&mutex);
00062         }
00063 
00065         Mutex &operator=(const Mutex &mutex) {
00066             assign(&mutex);
00067             m_lock = mutex.m_lock;
00068             return *this;
00069         }
00070 
00071         virtual ~Mutex() {
00072             release();
00073         }
00074 
00075         /* implement */
00076         virtual void destroy() {
00077             if (m_lock != 0)
00078                 _ctk_mutex_destroy(m_lock);
00079         }
00080 #else /* __SPU__ */
00081         Mutex(ea_addr_t lock_ea) : m_lock(lock_ea) { }
00082 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00083 
00084         void init() {
00085             _ctk_mutex_init(m_lock);
00086         }
00087 
00088         void lock() {
00089             _ctk_mutex_lock(m_lock);
00090         }
00091 
00092         void unlock() {
00093             _ctk_mutex_unlock(m_lock);
00094         }
00095 
00096         int trylock() {
00097             return _ctk_mutex_trylock(m_lock);
00098         }
00099 
00100         virtual operator void*() {
00101             return (void*)(unsigned long)m_lock;
00102         }
00103 
00104         virtual operator ea_addr_t () {
00105             return m_lock;
00106         }
00107 };
00108 
00121 template <typename L> class ScopedLock {
00122     private:
00123         L& m_lock;
00124 
00125     public:
00126         ScopedLock(L& mutex) : m_lock(mutex) { m_lock.lock(); }
00127         ~ScopedLock() { m_lock.unlock(); }
00128 
00129     private:
00130         ScopedLock();   // no impl.
00131 };
00132 
00133 typedef ScopedLock<Mutex> ScopedMutexLock;
00134 
00135 }; // namespace ctk
00136 
00137 #endif /* _CTK_MUTEX_HPP */
